reviewText:
This is the worst horsemanship DVD I've ever watched.
Martin Black and Dr Peters would have people buy into the fact that the only way to teach a horse anything is to frighten it silly. What they are condoning is brutal training.
Worse still, they try to pass this off as "scientific" evidence. Have they ever heard of the scientific data regarding positive reinforcement? Apparently not.
I'm appalled and shocked.
Very good information and is  good introductory material for the book.

Excellent scientific, psychological study of equine learning theory!!!! If you learn enough about equine behavior and learning theory, you can become a problem solver. It takes the mystery out of horse training and narrows it down to a very few basic principles!
